Name: Ahmed Ragab
BioText: Shaykh Ahmed Ragab started Hifz of Qurâ€™an in 1981, when he was 7 years old. He then became a Hifz teacher in 1990. After Shaykh Ahmed finished his secondary education, he enrolled in the Institute of Qirat, and then achieved Ijazah in Tajweed and higher certificate of Qirat.
